-e ---

Easily recognizable syllable:

𒈾 ≈ 𒀸𒑊𒁹 ≈ 𒀸𒌓 INI.UTU ≈ •NIUT/NAUT 𓈖
𒈾 ≈ 𒀸𒁁𒁹 ( 𒑊 ≈ 𒀸𒑱 ≠ 𒁁 ) 𒈾 ≈ 𒊩𒐺𒁹 nin / mun 𒈾 ≈ 𒐺𒁹 in 𒀀𒐺𒁹 A.NA a.ma 𒈠 ≠ 𒃲 𓅓 mû/ma 𒈾 NA ≈ 𒉢 NU11 nur 𓈖 𓅘 𓎛 𓋞 𒈾 NA 𒈾 ≈ 𒆠 Nagar 𜎂𓊖𜎂 𒈾 NA < Nun/nahr/narmer 𓏌 #nur/Napf 𜏠 𓆢 𓈖 𓂝 𓂋 𓆛 fish @ Nem/Nar/Nile/Naut/Nass
𒈾 NAᵗ ≈ 𜏠 ma in manis ≈ 𓏠 𓈖 𓏴 𓏌 𓏋 | 𜏠 𜑊 𜎮 𒈾 NAᵗ not 𓂜 𒉌 > 𒉡 …𒈾 (e)na ¬not "ohne" @ Sumerian

𒈾 ᵛNA 𒈾𒁲𒈾𒉌 ᵛna-di-na-ni vendor "giver" π

𒍝𒂊𒈾 za-e-na ohne Sie "except you"

𒈾 NAⁿ 𒈾𒉡𒌋 na-nu-u 难 nán/nàn "man" #amēlu a•Männlein 𒈾 NA noble "foremost" <> 𒈤 𒀠 mah₂ maha 𒈾 MAⁿ in 𒊩𒐺𒁹 ≈ 𒈾𒉡𒌋 ma-nu-u "man" vs mun a-mi-li 𒀀𒈪𒇷 "man" 𒈾 MAⁿ in 𒈾𒃰 manager 𓏠 𓈖 𓃒 𓀸 ⲙⲁⲛⲉⲥⲱⲟⲩ mana-gada 牛 niú.guard 𒈾 NA ≈ MA 𜏠 𐙁 𜓚 𜎷 𜏔 𒈾 NA ≈ Napf 𐃫 urn 𓏌 𓈖 = water < nagar נגר nâgar 𓈖 𓍇 𓏌 𓈗 𓈘 nager 𒉀

𒈾 ku-ú carp 𒄩 ḪA® 𒈾 ku-ú-a 𒄩 ḪA qua que the precative particle 𒀀𒀀 aᶢᵘa 𒅗𒅗 𒋛𒂵 KA.KA si-ga

𒈾𒈨 na-me «name» placeholder "somebody" #mamma

𒀏 | NINA 𒈾 NANŠE 魚 na (Old Japanese) 𓆛 ܢܘܢܐ nūnā (fish) NEM 𐰢 Mem
𒈾 𒉡𒌑𒉡 nu-ú-nu "fish" 𒈾 ña ञ nyā न्या ငါး nga: 鱼 ngṳ̀ 鱼 nyie4 Proto-Sino-Tibetan *(s)ŋja 5 ձուկն jukn (fish)
𒈾 nūnā ܢܘܢܐ nūnā נוּנָא minu (fish)
𒈾 namas nomaˀne namak ⇔ سمك samak swimmake (fish) (numero:sumero!?) nsomba!
𒈾 namak মচ্ছ maccha mackerel Makrele Sanskrit মৎস্য (mátsya) *mátsyas Matjes ꠝꠣꠍ (masó), Assamese মাছ (mas), Oriya ମାଛ (machô), Hindi मच्छ (macch), Punjabi ਮੱਛ (maccha), Sindhi مَڇُ / मछु (machu), Marathi मासा (māsā). মৎস্য (motšo).

𒈾 ≈ 𒊩𒐺𒁹 na-a "stone" ≈ 𒎎 NI+IT 𒈾 ≈ 𒊩𒐺𒁹 nu-u "nulla" not negation 𒈾 ≈ 𒊩𒐺𒁹 na-nu-u mun "man" 𒅕 𒈾 ≈ 𒊩𒐺𒁹 na-a 𒈾 MA in 𒊩𒐺𒁹 ≈ 𒈾𒉡𒌋 ma-nu-u "man" vs mun a-mi-li 𒀀𒈪𒇷 "man"

𒀭𒈾 an-na "upper"

𒈾 NA ≈ MA 𜏠 𜓚 𜎷 𜏔 𐙁 in

𒈾𒊑 ≈ 𒈾𒁺𒁺 na-degₓ nadeg نَصِيحَة naṣīḥa مَشُورَة mašūra "advice" <> march 𒈾𒄰𒌈 na-kam-tum #nakkamtu ᵐnakamtum magatzem مَخَازِن maḵāzin магаци́н magacín magazine chamber "storehouse" 𒈾𒈨 na-me «name» placeholder "somebody" #mamma

𒈾 NAUT

𒈾 NAᵗ in 𒋛𒂦𒈾 si-un₃-na si'unaᵗ zenith

𒈾 NA ≈ ana- prefix

𒁷 DIN don give <> 𒈾𒁕𒉡 na-da-nu 𒈾𒁕𒉡 to give ≈ 𒄿𒈾𒀜𒁲𒅔 i-na-ad-di-in eingeben entreichen 𒄿𒈾𒀜𒁲𒅔 give, pay, hand out (*ent-don) ≈ 𒄿𒈾𒀜𒁺𒌑 i-na-ad-du-ú 𒄿𒈾𒀜𒁺𒌑 "give", throw (into water) ≈ 𒅔𒈾𒀜𒉡 i-na-ad-nu 𒅔𒈾𒀜𒉡 give(n) (𒋳 šum zu ihm, to him)

𒅅𒆠𒅖 ik-ki-is "axe" 𒅅𒆠𒅖 cut down (tree) <> 𒋗𒄿𒈾𒀝𒆠𒋢 i-na-ak-ki-su 𒋗𒄿𒈾𒀝𒆠𒋢 cut off (hand)

𒅅𒆠𒅁 ik-ki-ip <> 𓂧 𓃀 𓄏 | horn | 𓄋 𓊪 𓏲 𒅅𒆠𒅁 ik-kiʳip kerb- carve ≠ кров krov krev crúor ☑ 𒅅𒆠𒅁 gore (with horn s) cornear coger ≠ ἔαρ éar <> 𒈾𒀝𒅗𒁉 na-ak-ka-pí 𒈾𒀝𒅗𒁉 prone to gore <> 𒈾𒀝𒅗𒁍𒌑 na-ak-ka-pu-ú 𒈾𒀝𒅗𒁍𒌑 prone to gore

𒈾𒃰 NA.GADA goat-guard 𒈾𒃰 shepherd

𒈾 sunrise to moonset <> 𒋙 moonset to sunrise vs 𒈨 moonrise to sunset 𒆳 moonrise to sunrise
